title: Quetzalcoatl - primary purpose in the passage

content.question: The primary purpose in the passage is to

choices.label: account for the transmission of culture during a period of global change

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
